text: Madison Lee De La Garza (Dallas, Texas; December 28, 2001) is an American actress, maternal half-sister of the singer and actress Demi Lovato.Disney Demi-Goddess, Washington Post, 21 de junio de 2008 She is best known by her role of Juanita Solís in Desperate Housewives. == Life and career == Madison De La Garza was born in Dallas, Texas, daughter of Dianna De La Garza and Eddie De La Garza. De La Garza plays the recurrent role of Juanita Solís, in Desperate Housewives of ABC. Juanita is the daughter of Gabrielle Solís (Eva Longoria) and Carlos Solís (Ricardo Chavira). == Personal life == De La Garza has been bullied at school, and her sister Demi talked about her and that she has been intimidated. In December 2010, De la Garza announced through Twitter that she was doing a Christmas present for his sister Demi, who was receiving treatment for "physical and emotional problems" == References == ==Other websites== * * * Category:Living people Category:2001 births Category:Actors from Dallas Category:American child actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors
title: Madison De La Garza
